name: 谜桥 / RiddleBridge
description:
This is a beautiful love story of the cowherd and the weaver girl. The cowherd and the weaver girl fell in love, but the queen mother destroyed it.Every year, they could only meet once on July 7th (lunar calendar). Countless magpies are touched by the faithful love, and build a bridge of magpies flying for the cowherd and the weaver girl.
"RiddleBridge" is an independent game based on this love story.Player play the role of Magpies, build a connected bridge.The game includes beautiful pictures and exquisite scenery, and classical Chinese music. You need to pay your imagination and creativity to find a "key" to solve puzzles.

Game features:
Combining the puzzles with the classic "Tetris square"

Game play:
Drag the Tetris on top of the screen.Put them on the right side to build the "bridge".Don't touch the wrong things.
